verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Make known the riches of Your glory
Make known the power of Your grace
Use me to show the world Your greatness
Send me to demonstrate Your love

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nothing can separate me from unfailing love
Nothing can ever take me from Your faithful arms,
And here I rejoice, in You, I rejoice

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus, hung dying and rejected
Such love displayed for all to see
And O, it makes me bow in wonder
To know You conquered death for me, for me

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You work all things for my good
And for Your glory, for Your glory
